text: So you're in a creepy mansion, and a crazy skeleton-lady may or may not be trying to kill you. But on the upside, you've got rockin' tunes!

text: All the Kemco games had a neat way of making their unique sounds.  From their certain style of song selections I could always tell when I was playing a Kemco game.
